StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Over 2+ years of experience in IT and Expertise in Linux, SQL, Hadoop, Sqoop, Hive, PIG HBase, and Zookeeper with hands on project experience in various Vertical Applications which includes Entertainment and Networking Industries. 2+ years of experience in configuring, installing, benchmarking and managing Apache Hadoop. Experience with Cluster maintenance tasks like adding and removing nodes, enabling High availability, installing services, applying patches. Installing and integrating of a new services onto the Hadoop cluster. Monitoring and troubleshooting of services running on Hadoop clusters. Setup of backup and recovery. Monitoring and troubleshooting of services running on Hadoop clusters. Storing the Terabyte's of Data in Hadoop Cluster. Maintaining and Managing the Hadoop Cluster with Huge amount of Structure and Unstructured Data.
